hero.title: Build the Future of AI-Powered Automation
hero.subtitle: Join a team that's transforming how enterprises operate. We're building the automation platform that operations teams actually love—combining cutting-edge AI with enterprise-grade reliability.
whoThrivesHere: **Problem solvers** who thrive on turning complex operational challenges into elegant solutions
**Builders** who take ownership from design through deployment and beyond
**Learners** who stay curious about AI, automation, and emerging technologies
**Collaborators** who believe the best products come from diverse perspectives
**Impact-driven professionals** who want their work to measurably improve how businesses operate

items.title: Premium Health Coverage
items.description: 100% coverage for employees, 75% for dependents. Medical, dental, vision, and mental health support.

items.title: Wellness Stipend
items.description: $100/month for gym memberships, fitness classes, meditation apps, or wellness activities of your choice.

items.title: Mental Health Support
items.description: Access to licensed therapists through Modern Health, plus 10 dedicated mental health days annually.

items.title: 4-Day Work Week
items.description: We operate Tuesday-Friday, giving everyone a genuine 3-day weekend to recharge.

items.title: Unlimited PTO
items.description: Minimum 20 days encouraged annually. We trust you to manage your time and take breaks when needed.

items.title: Flexible Schedule
items.description: Core collaboration hours 10am-3pm PT. Outside that, work when you're most productive.

items.title: Remote-First Culture
items.description: Work from anywhere in the US. Office access available in SF, NYC, and Austin for those who want it.

items.title: Learning Budget
items.description: $3,000/year for courses, conferences, books, or certifications. Plus dedicated time to use it.

items.title: Conference Attendance
items.description: Attend 2 conferences annually. We cover tickets, travel, and accommodation.

items.title: Internal Growth Paths
items.description: Clear IC and management tracks with transparent leveling framework and promotion criteria.

items.title: Competitive Salary
items.description: Market-rate compensation benchmarked to SF/NYC, regardless of location. Transparent salary bands.

items.title: Meaningful Equity
items.description: Early-stage equity grants with 4-year vesting and 1-year cliff. 10-year exercise window.

items.title: Annual Bonuses
items.description: Performance-based bonuses tied to individual impact and company milestones.

items.title: Parental Leave
items.description: 16 weeks fully paid for primary caregivers, 8 weeks for secondary. Gradual return-to-work program.

items.title: Family Planning Support
items.description: $20,000 lifetime benefit for fertility treatments, adoption, or surrogacy.

items.title: Home Office Setup
items.description: $2,000 budget for desk, chair, monitor, and equipment. Annual $500 refresh stipend.

items.title: Team Offsites
items.description: Quarterly in-person gatherings in different cities. Mix of work sessions and team building.

items.title: Peer Recognition
items.description: Monthly $500 spot bonuses nominated by peers for exceptional contributions.

items.title: Stock in Success
items.description: Profit-sharing program once we hit $10M ARR. Everyone shares in the upside.

workEnvironment.title: How We Work
workEnvironment.description: We're building for the long term—sustainable pace, thoughtful decisions, and respect for work-life balance.
principles: **Async-first communication**: Default to written updates; meetings are for collaboration, not information sharing
**Ship early, iterate often**: Perfect is the enemy of shipped. We value feedback loops over lengthy planning
**Radical transparency**: Everyone has context on company metrics, roadmap, and strategic decisions
**Blameless culture**: We focus on systems, not individuals. Mistakes are learning opportunities
**Customer obsession**: Every role involves regular customer exposure—research, support, or feedback sessions

applicationProcess.title: Our Hiring Process
applicationProcess.description: We move quickly and respect your time. Typical process takes 7-10 days from application to offer.

steps.description: We review every application personally. You'll hear back either way within 48 hours.
Quick chat about your background, what you're looking for, and what we're building.
Deep dive into your experience, problem-solving approach, and fit with the role.
For engineers: pair programming session. For designers: portfolio walkthrough. For other roles: case study discussion.
Meet 4-5 team members across functions. Focused on collaboration, values alignment, and mutual fit.
We make offers quickly. Reference checks happen in parallel to speed things up.
